Package student.view.cli

Class CarRentalCLIView

java.lang.Object
student.view.cli.CarRentalCLIView
All Implemented Interfaces:
CarRentalViewInterface
public class CarRentalCLIView extends Object implements CarRentalViewInterface
View class for the car rental system. Handles user interaction and display of information.

    • exportAvailableCarsToCSV

      public void exportAvailableCarsToCSV(CarBookingService bookingService)
      Exports the available cars to a CSV file named "available_cars.csv". The list of cars is sorted by their registration numbers before exporting.
      Specified by:
      exportAvailableCarsToCSV in interface CarRentalViewInterface
      Parameters:
      bookingService - The booking service used to retrieve available cars.

    • exportBookingToCSV

      public void exportBookingToCSV(CarBooking booking)
      Exports the details of a given car booking to a CSV file. The CSV file is named using the booking ID in the format "booking_{bookingId}.csv".
      Parameters:
      booking - The car booking whose details are to be exported.

    • bookCarAndExport

      public void bookCarAndExport(UserService userService, CarBookingService bookingService)
      Books a car for a user and exports the booking details to a CSV file. The method displays available cars, prompts the user for the car registration number and user ID, performs the booking, and then calls exportBookingToCSV(CarBooking) to export the booking.
      Specified by:
      bookCarAndExport in interface CarRentalViewInterface
      Parameters:
      userService - The user service used to retrieve user details.
      bookingService - The booking service used to handle booking operations.

    • displayAllUsers

      public void displayAllUsers(UserService userService)
      Displays all users in the system.
      Specified by:
      displayAllUsers in interface CarRentalViewInterface
      Parameters:
      userService - The user service to use for retrieving users

    • displayAvailableCars

      public void displayAvailableCars(CarBookingService bookingService, boolean isElectric)
      Displays available cars, either all available cars or only electric ones.
      Specified by:
      displayAvailableCars in interface CarRentalViewInterface
      Parameters:
      bookingService - The booking service to use for retrieving available cars
      isElectric - If true, displays only electric cars; otherwise, displays all available cars

    • displayUserBookings

      public void displayUserBookings(UserService userService, CarBookingService bookingService)
      Displays all cars booked by a specific user.
      Specified by:
      displayUserBookings in interface CarRentalViewInterface
      Parameters:
      userService - The user service to use for user retrieval
      bookingService - The booking service to use for booking operations

    • displayAllBookings

      public void displayAllBookings(CarBookingService bookingService)
      Displays all bookings in the system.
      Specified by:
      displayAllBookings in interface CarRentalViewInterface
      Parameters:
      bookingService - The booking service to use for retrieving bookings

    • displayCarsSortedByPrice

      public void displayCarsSortedByPrice(CarService carService)
      Displays a list of cars sorted by rental price in ascending order. This method retrieves the sorted list from the provided car service and then prints each car.
      Specified by:
      displayCarsSortedByPrice in interface CarRentalViewInterface
      Parameters:
      carService - The car service used to retrieve and sort the list of cars.

    • displayCarsByPriceRange

      public void displayCarsByPriceRange(CarService carService)
      Prompts the user to input a minimum and maximum price, then retrieves and displays the cars that fall within the specified price range.
      Specified by:
      displayCarsByPriceRange in interface CarRentalViewInterface
      Parameters:
      carService - The car service used to filter the list of cars based on the given price range.

    • displayCarsByKeyword

      public void displayCarsByKeyword(CarService carService)
      Prompts the user to enter a keyword and displays cars that match the keyword. The search is performed based on various attributes such as brand or registration number.
      Specified by:
      displayCarsByKeyword in interface CarRentalViewInterface
      Parameters:
      carService - The car service used to search for cars by keyword.

    • cancelBooking

      public void cancelBooking(CarBookingService bookingService)
      Cancels a booking by prompting the user for a booking ID.

      This method displays all current bookings, allows the user to enter the ID of the booking they wish to cancel, and then calls the booking service to perform the cancellation.

      Specified by:
      cancelBooking in interface CarRentalViewInterface
      Parameters:
      bookingService - The booking service used to cancel the selected booking.

    • registerUser

      public void registerUser(UserService userService)
      Prompts the user to enter a name and attempts to register a new user.

      If registration is successful, the system prints the new user's ID and confirmation message. If a user with the same name already exists, an error message is shown.

      Specified by:
      registerUser in interface CarRentalViewInterface
      Parameters:
      userService - The user service used to register the user.

    • loginUser

      public void loginUser(UserService userService)
      Prompts the user to enter their name and attempts to log them in.

      If a user with the entered name exists, a welcome message and their ID is shown. Otherwise, an error message is displayed indicating the user was not found.

      Specified by:
      loginUser in interface CarRentalViewInterface
      Parameters:
      userService - The user service used to search for the user.
